title: [Childrens' compilation]
creator_credit: Walton Films and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: A compliation of four short animated films for children. The titles are “Aladdin and his lamp”, “It’s the circus part 2”, “Puppy love” and “The Charging bull”. “Aladdin and his lamp” A puppet version of Aladdin and his magic lamp. “It’s the circus part 2” Bertram Mills Circus featuring live action horses, trapeze artists, chimps, clowns and lion tamers. “Puppy love” Mickey visits his sweetheart Minnie, presenting her with gifts. As he courts her, Mickey’s dog Pluto attempts to woo Minnie’s dog by presenting her with a gift intended for Minnie. Pluto exchanges Minnie’s gift with a bone. “The Charging bull” A charging bull tries to bowl over Mickey Mouse. Mickey’s automobile defends him and Minnie.
